welcome_message_body: Welcome to Minato, Japan! Embrace the beauty of this vibrant city known for its stunning skyline, historic temples, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Minato has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Otochan (焼肉 乙ちゃん)

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Haneda Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal dedicated to international flights at Haneda Airport.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection after a certain period of time.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport handles all air freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
